original_text: And when the south wind blew softly, supposing that they had obtained their purpose, loosing thence, they sailed close by Crete.
korean_text: 남풍이 순하게 불매 그들이 뜻을 이룬 줄 알고 닻을 감아 그레데 해변을 끼고 항해하더니

sentences.original_text: And when south wind blew softly
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남쪽 바람이 부드럽게 불 때

sentences.original_text: supposing that they had obtained their purpose
